title: Game Server Capacity Management
description: Following the launch of a new game expansion, player concurrency is higher than expected, causing login queues.

tasks.description: Identify which game servers are experiencing high player load and long login queues.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that the EU and US-East servers are at 100% capacity.

tasks.description: Provision and deploy new temporary game server instances in the affected regions from the cloud provider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully spins up 10 new server instances for the EU region.

tasks.description: Add the new instances to the matchmaking pool to alleviate player load.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the server pool configuration, and login queues begin to decrease.
